reviewText: Try this for 40 days and see the change in your life!  Brings the light into your body and soul.  Centers you for each day.  Beautiful!
Brainwashing.  Exhausting.  If you want to get out of mental ruts - Join a healthy community, meditate and exercise every day - it'll do you more good.
The illustrations are outstanding. The brains of the of how the brain performs are done simply and clearly. Beautiful work.

If you are sick and have been told that your mind can heal you, that illness is fostered by how you think, that you can heal yourself...then this is the video you need to explain that process. If you are a die hard Christian everything is about Jesus this is not for you. This is for the person who understands the metaphysical parameters of healing and is open to receiving those healing energies and using them with whatever establish religious practices they believe in.
There are thousands of people with testimonies of healing themselves through guided imagery like Brain Illumination. It's beautifully done and the explanations by Tresemer prior to the video is very helpful. I've noticed over the years that the conventional medical community lags behind the  alternative medical community. Energy medicine and its healing properties have been known and practiced for years in the East. Finally the West is opening up to the  Energetics field and much of the research is supportive of the very things being taught in the DVD. If you have a loved one who is sick with cancer, heart disease or any chronic disease I recommend this DVD for daily visualization of wholeness and wellness.
I can watch this EVERY DAY and I won't get tired of it.  When I watch it, I think I can actually feel the parts of the brain that are "illuminated" during hte meditations.

Sai Maa's Brain Illumination DVD is ENLIVENING ENLIGHTENING. Simply by watching the dvd we bring the Light into our cells, into our aura, and most importantly into our BRAIN. I have noticed a change in my Energy levels throughout the day, in my thoughts and my emotions. Outstanding the effects by simply watching this dvd! I Love it!

I have been practicing Brain Illumination each day as a part of my spiritual practice for over a year. Using the Brain Illumination DVD has actually enlivened my experience of being "light". I physically experience "light" in my brain and body! I feel/know myself as "light" and am able to allow this to permeate my life. This has been a life changing experience and I highly recommend using the DVDBrain Illumination DVD and experiencing for oneself the possibilities.

As a Reiki Master-Teacher many of my clients do not know the power their thoughts have on their body.  With this DVD no one has to know how thoughts affect our physical and mental health.  By simply watching this DVD you will be taking healing light through every organ, gland and system in the human body.  Self-love is a powerful healing force, when it is sabataged by self-loathing the cells in our body are denied loving energy to grow.  Even if you are not ill - by watching this DVD you will find yourself in a state of relaxation which helps clear away stress and any doctor will tell you that stress is the precursor for health conditions, such as high blood pressure, heart probelms, inflammatory disease, cancer, etc. You don't have to know how to meditate - just watch this DVD!  I highly recommend this DVD for anyone who has an illness.
